name: Akhil Thata
title: Web/iOS Developer
description: Hello! My name is Akhil Thata and I am a web/iOS developer based in the United States. I have experience working with diverse web frameworks such as React, Angular, and Next as well as iOS mobile technologies such as UIKit and SwiftUI. I enjoy making user-friendly applications that are intuitive, accessible, and built with clean, maintainable code.  I'm passionate about staying up to date with modern development practices, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and turning complex challenges into elegant solutions.
